Package org.mongodb.morphia.mapping.codec

Provides various codec support classes

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrayFieldAccessor
    Accessor for array fields.
    ClassCodec
    A Codec for storing class definitions in the database
    Conversions
    Defines simple type conversions
    DocumentWriter
    Specialized writer for serializing a Document.
    EnumCodecProvider
    Provides a Codec for enums.
    FieldAccessor
    Defines an accessor for a field
    KeyCodec
    A Codec for Key
    MorphiaCodec<T>
    A Codec for Morphia mapped types
    MorphiaCodecProvider
    CodecProvider for handling Morphia entities
    MorphiaCollectionPropertyCodecProvider
    Defines a provider for Morphia-specific collection handling
    MorphiaPropertySerialization
    Morphia's implementation of PropertySerialization
    MorphiaTypesCodecProvider
    Defines a ValueCodecProvider for common types used in entities.
    ObjectCodec
    Defines a Codec for handling fields declared as Objects.
    PrimitiveCodecProvider
    A provider of Codecs for primitive types.
    ReferenceHandler
    Defines a PropertyHandler for references
    URICodec
    Defines a Codec for URLs

Package org.mongodb.morphia.mapping.codec Description
